{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=NTV200 |upc=606449079579 |asin=B005MJWGJC |fcc_date=08/17/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |availability=now |type=video streamer |fcc_id=PY311200164 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM7615 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B1G1646G-BCH9 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB (non-standard connector) |expansion_usb_num= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=USB (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43235 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=HDMI, SPDIF |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} :[http://www.netgear.com/home/products/hometheater/media-players/ntv200.aspx Product page]
{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=NTV200|vs_id=19553}} "E187451", "48.JP301.0GA", "2011/06/27" is silkscreened on the main board. "48DNUB0L.SGB", "2011/04/15" is silkscreened on the wireless module. :[[Wistron NeWeb]] is the probable OEM. *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/5267/netgear-ntv200-overthetop-streaming-for-nonnetworked-tvs/1 On '''AnandTech''']
